plot outline: "Aa Marma" is a 2010 Indian Kannada film, directed by " H Madan" and Produced by "H Madhusudhan".The film Stars "Thriller Manju, Jackie Shroff, Saikumar, Ramkiran, Archana Reddy", in lead roles. The film had musical score by " H Madan". Watch the full Movie, Aa Marma , online, only On Eros Now.
